LIDER Jeans is the area where LIDER constantly apply new technique in denim and keep pace with the latest trend in order to hit the untouched G-Spot of wearers. 
With the official release of the LIDER Jeans line, we at LIDER hope to offer the ultimate pleasure to wearers who style, hang out, work, live, and love in denim.
Experience the pleasure yourself with LIDER Jeans. All gender welcome at #LIDERCLUB.
